nodes.text: Timoth 4 was an CR92a Assassin-class corvette belonging to the Bothans. Timoth 4 was carrying specialized decoding computers which could decipher the secret data onboard the Suprosa, a Imperial freighter that was stolen by the Rebels. Tan Maarek Stele inspected this corvette under orders of the secret order before allowing the ship to enter hyperspace.
According to Star Wars: X-Wing Alliance, the plans were delivered to a corvette named Razor.
